com.absio.provider

Class ServerProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.provider.BaseProvider
      • com.absio.provider.ServerProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainerProvider

    public class ServerProvider
extends BaseProvider
implements IContainerProvider
    This is a Provider for the Absio Broker™ application. It will perform all basic user related operations including: user management, public key management and key file management.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.absio.provider.BaseProvider

      Create an uninitialized and unauthenticated provider that trusts all certificates.

    • Method Detail

      • changeCredentials

        public byte[] changeCredentials(String password,
                                String passphrase)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                IllegalAccessException,
                                NoSuchPaddingException,
                                InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                BadPaddingException,
                                InvalidKeyException,
                                IOException,
                                BrokerException,
                                InterruptedException
        This will change the authenticated user's credentials. The user's key file will be uploaded to Absio Broker™ application. No reminder will be used (it will be set to "").

        NOTE: this requires an initialized and authenticated session. Also, both the password and passphrase are required.

        Parameters:
        password - the new password for the authenticated user
        passphrase - the new passphrase for the authenticated user
        Returns:
        the encrypted key file bytes (using the new credentials)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the password or passphrase are null or empty
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the provider is not authenticated
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the padding is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - thrown if the algorithm parameter is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if the algorithm is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        IllegalBlockSizeException - thrown if the block size is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        BadPaddingException - thrown if the padding is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        InvalidKeyException - thrown if the key is not valid when the key ring is encrypted
        IOException - thrown if there are any issues communicating with Absio Broker™ application or writing the encrypted key ring
        BrokerException - thrown if there are any Absio Broker™ application issues creating or updating the key file
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • changeCredentials

        public byte[] changeCredentials(String password,
                                String passphrase,
                                String reminder)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                IllegalAccessException,
                                NoSuchPaddingException,
                                InvalidKeyException,
                                NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                BadPaddingException,
                                InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                IOException,
                                BrokerException,
                                InterruptedException
        This will change the authenticated user's credentials. The user's key file will be uploaded to Absio Broker™ application. The reminder can be used to help recall a forgotten passphrase (see getReminder(UUID)).

        NOTE: this requires an initialized and authenticated session. Also, both the password and passphrase are required.

        Parameters:
        password - the new password for the authenticated user (required)
        passphrase - the new passphrase for the authenticated user (required)
        reminder - the reminder for the authenticated user
        Returns:
        the encrypted key file bytes (using the new credentials)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the password or passphrase are null or empty
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the provider is not authenticated
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the padding is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - thrown if the algorithm parameter is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if the algorithm is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        IllegalBlockSizeException - thrown if the block size is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        BadPaddingException - thrown if the padding is not supported when the key ring is encrypted
        InvalidKeyException - thrown if the key is not valid when the key ring is encrypted
        IOException - thrown if there are any issues communicating with Absio Broker™ application or writing the encrypted key ring
        BrokerException - thrown if there are any Absio Broker™ application issues creating or updating the key file
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • create

        public SecuredContainer create(byte[] content,
                               String customHeaderObject,
                               List<Access> accesses,
                               String type)
                        throws Exception
        Creates and persists a new SecuredContainer on the Absio Broker™ application and returns it. Use SecuredContainer.getId() to learn the assigned ID.

        Calling this method requires an authenticated session. See logIn(UUID, String, String) for authenticating.

        Specified by:
        create in interface IContainerProvider
        Parameters:
        content - the container's content
        customHeaderObject - the container's header
        accesses - the container's access list - if null the container will have default access for the creator
        type - the container's type
        Returns:
        the created SecuredContainer
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there are any issues encrypting and persisting the container in the Absio Broker™ application

        public SecuredContainer createOrUpdate(Container container)
                                throws Exception
        Encrypts the Container and uploads the encrypted content and the Metadata to the Absio Broker™ application.
        Specified by:
        createOrUpdate in interface IContainerProvider
        Parameters:
        container - the Container to create or update
        Returns:
        the created or updated SecuredContainer
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there are any issues encrypting and persisting the container in the Absio Broker™ application

                                throws IOException,
                                       InterruptedException,

                                       IllegalAccessException

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        container - the SecuredContainer to create or update
        Returns:
        the SecuredContainer with the new metadata from the Absio Broker™ application
        Throws:

        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request

      • createOrUpdatePublicKey

        public void createOrUpdatePublicKey(IndexedECPublicKey publicKey)
                             throws BrokerException,
                                    IOException,
                                    IllegalAccessException,
                                    InterruptedException
        This will create or update the public key for the authenticated user.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized and authenticated session.

        Parameters:
        publicKey - the public key to create or update
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown if there are any Absio Broker™ application issues creating or updating the key
        IOException - thrown if there are any issues communicating with Absio Broker™ application or writing the public key
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not authenticated
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

                                    int index,
                                    boolean active)
                             throws BrokerException,
                                    IOException,
                                    IllegalAccessException,
                                    InterruptedException
        This will create or update the public key for the authenticated user.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized and authenticated session.

        Parameters:
        publicKey - the public key to create or update
        type - the key type to create or update
        index - the key index to create or update
        active - the active state of the key to create or update
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown if there are any Absio Broker™ application issues creating or updating the key
        IOException - thrown if there are any issues communicating with Absio Broker™ application or writing the public key
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not authenticated
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

            throws InterruptedException,
                   BrokerException,
                   IOException,
                   IllegalAccessException
        Deletes the encrypted content of the container and deletes the metadata records from the Absio Broker™ application.
        Specified by:

        containerId - the id of the container to delete
        Throws:

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser()
                throws IllegalAccessException,
                       IOException,
                       BrokerException,
                       InterruptedException
        This will delete the user from Absio Broker™ application. This means that all public keys and the backed up key file will be removed and unrecoverable.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized and authenticated session.

        WARNING: this will completely delete the user from Absio Broker™ application

        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not authenticated
        IOException - thrown if there are any issues communicating with Absio Broker™ application
        BrokerException - thrown if there are any Absio Broker™ application issues deleting the user
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • get

        public Container get(UUID containerId)
              throws Exception
        Returns the SecuredContainer from the Absio Broker™ application. This will have the encrypted data as well as the metadata from the Absio Broker™ application.
        Specified by:
        get in interface IContainerProvider
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the container to get
        Returns:
        the decrypted SecuredContainer (a Container
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there are any issues getting or decrypting the secured container

      • getContent

        public byte[] getContent(UUID containerId)
                  throws Exception
        Gets the decrypted content of the secured container for the given ID.

        Calling this method requires an authenticated session. See logIn(UUID, String, String) for authenticating.

        Specified by:
        getContent in interface IContainerProvider
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the secured container to get the content of
        Returns:
        the decrypted secured container content or null if the container is not found
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there are any issues getting or decrypting the secured container content

      • getEvents

        public EventPackage getEvents(EventActionType actionType,
                              EventType eventType,
                              Long startingId,
                              Long endingId,
                              UUID containerId,
                              String containerType)
                       throws IOException,
                              InterruptedException,
                              BrokerException,
                              IllegalAccessException
        Gets all events that match the event type, action type, starting id, ending id, container id and type. No parameters are required. If none are supplied this will return all ContainerEvents for all time for the authenticated user. This can be used to synchronize accounts or keep a store up-to-date with the latest container activity related to the user.
        Parameters:
        actionType - the specific type action you wish to pull (null will get all actions)
        eventType - the specific type of events you wish to pull (null will get all events)
        startingId - the id to start pulling from (null will start from the beginning)
        endingId - the id to stop pulling from (null will get all events)
        containerId - the specific id of a container to pull events for (null will get events for all containers)
        containerType - the specific type value to look for events for (null will get containers with any type value)
        Returns:
        the list of events based on the given parameters
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if there were any IO issues
        InterruptedException - thrown if there were issues while dealing with rate limiting
        BrokerException - thrown if there were any issues with the requests to Absio Broker™ application
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not authenticated

      • getEventsMapper

        public EventsMapper getEventsMapper()
        Get the EventsMapper.
        Returns:
        the EventsMapper

        public Header getHeader(UUID containerId)

        Specified by:
        getHeader in interface IContainerProvider
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the secured container to get the header of
        Returns:
        the decrypted secured container header or null if the container is not found
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there are any issues getting or decrypting the secured container header

      • getPublicKeyByIndex

        public IndexedECPublicKey getPublicKeyByIndex(UUID userId,
                                              KeyType type,
                                              int index)
                                       throws BrokerException,
                                              IOException,
                                              IllegalAccessException,
                                              InterruptedException
        This will get a single public key from Absio Broker™ application. The public key of the defined user id, type and index.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized and authenticated session.

        Parameters:
        userId - the user id that owns the key in question (required)
        type - the type of the key in question (required)
        index - the index of the key in question (required)
        Returns:
        the specified public key (user id, type and index)
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown if there are any Absio Broker™ application issues getting the key
        IOException - thrown if there are any issues communicating with Absio Broker™ application
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not authenticated
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the userId or type are null
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • getPublicKeyLatestActive

        public IndexedECPublicKey getPublicKeyLatestActive(UUID userId,
                                                   KeyType type)
                                            throws BrokerException,
                                                   IOException,
                                                   IllegalAccessException,
                                                   InterruptedException
        This will get the latest public key from Absio Broker™ application. The public key of the defined user, type and highest active index.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized and authenticated session.

        Parameters:
        userId - the user id that owns the key in question (required)
        type - the type of the key in question (required)
        Returns:
        the specified public key (user id, type and highest active index)
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown if there are any Absio Broker™ application issues getting the key
        IOException - thrown if there are any issues communicating with Absio Broker™ application
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not authenticated
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the userId or type are null
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • getPublicKeyList

        public List<IndexedECPublicKey> getPublicKeyList(UUID userId,
                                                 KeyType type,
                                                 Integer index)
                                          throws BrokerException,
                                                 IOException,
                                                 IllegalAccessException,
                                                 InterruptedException
        Gets a user's public keys matching the key type and key ring index.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized and authenticated session and pass in null to ignore a parameter.

        Parameters:
        userId - the user's ID (required)
        type - the key type or ignored if null
        index - the key index or ignored if null
        Returns:
        a list of public keys that match the supplied criteria
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not authenticated
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • initialize

        public void initialize(String serverUrl,
                       String apiKey,
                       String applicationName)
                throws NoSuchPaddingException,
                       NoSuchAlgorithmException
        This will set up the Session and create the internal mappers.
        Parameters:
        serverUrl - the Absio Broker™ application URL
        apiKey - the provider's Absio Broker™ application API Key
        applicationName - the application name for debugging purposes (placed in the http headers when communicating with Absio Broker™ application)
        Throws:
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the default padding for symmetric encryption is not supported
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if ECDH is not supported

      • isAuthenticated

        public boolean isAuthenticated()
        Get if the provider is authenticated (i.e. it has a valid KeyRing).
        Returns:
        true if the provider is authenticated

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Get if the provider is initialized (i.e. it has a valid Session and the mappers have been created). Please see initialize(String, String, String) for how to initialize this provider.
        Returns:
        true if the provider is authenticated

      • logIn

        public byte[] logIn(UUID userId,
                    String password,
                    String passphrase)
             throws IllegalArgumentException,
                    IllegalAccessException,
                    NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                    BrokerException,
                    NoSuchPaddingException,
                    InvalidKeyException,
                    IllegalBlockSizeException,
                    BadPaddingException,
                    InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                    IOException,
                    SignatureException,
                    InterruptedException
        This will use the passphrase to pull the key file from Absio Broker™ application. It will then decrypt the key file and use the KeyRing to authenticate with Absio Broker™ application.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized session.

        Parameters:
        userId - the user to log in (required)
        password - the user's password (can be null - passphrase will be used)
        passphrase - the usere's passphrase (required)
        Returns:
        the encrypted key file bytes (from Absio Broker™ application)
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not initialized
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if the algorithm is not known to decrypt the key file
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the padding is not supported to decrypt the key file
        InvalidKeyException - thrown when there was an error with the key for signing data to be sent to Absio Broker™ application
        IllegalBlockSizeException - thrown if the cipher block size is wrong to decrypt the key file
        BadPaddingException - thrown if the cipher padding is not supported to decrypt the key file
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - thrown if the cipher algorithm is not supported to decrypt the key file
        SignatureException - thrown when there was an error signing data to be sent to Absio Broker™ application
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the user id or passphrase are not provided
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • logIn

        public void logIn(KeyRing keyRing)
           throws IllegalAccessException,
                  BrokerException,
                  SignatureException,
                  InvalidKeyException,
                  IOException,
                  InterruptedException,
                  NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                  NoSuchPaddingException
        Uses the provided KeyRing to authenticate with the Absio Broker™ application.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized session.

        Parameters:
        keyRing - the user's private key ring.
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        SignatureException - thrown when there was an error signing data to be sent to Absio Broker™ application
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        InvalidKeyException - thrown when there was an error with the key for signing data to be sent to Absio Broker™ application
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not initialized
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if the algorithm is not known to decrypt the key file
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the padding is not supported to decrypt the key file

      • logOut

        public void logOut()
        This will end an authenticated session. All mappers, the data connections, and the KeyRing will be cleared from memory.

      • needToSyncAccount

        public boolean needToSyncAccount(UUID userId,
                                 byte[] keyFileBytes)
                          throws IllegalAccessException,
                                 NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                 BrokerException,
                                 IOException,
                                 InterruptedException
        Generates a checksum of the encrypted keys file and checks if it matches the checksum of a keys file stored on the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's ID
        keyFileBytes - the encrypted key file
        Returns:
        true if the checksums matched
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown when a cryptographic algorithm is not supported
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not initialized

      • register

        public byte[] register(String password,
                       String passphrase)
                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                       InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                       NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                       IllegalAccessException,
                       NoSuchPaddingException,
                       IllegalBlockSizeException,
                       IOException,
                       BadPaddingException,
                       SignatureException,
                       InvalidKeyException,
                       BrokerException,
                       InterruptedException
        This will register the new user, authenticate with Absio Broker™ application and push the new key file to the Absio Broker™ application. This will use null for the reminder.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized session.

        Parameters:
        password - the new user's password (required)
        passphrase - the new user's passphrase (required)
        Returns:
        the encrypted key file content
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the password or passphrase are empty or null
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - thrown if the cipher algorithm is not supported to decrypt the key file
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if the algorithm is not known to decrypt the key file
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not initialized
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        SignatureException - thrown when there was an error signing data to be sent to Absio Broker™ application
        InvalidKeyException - thrown when there was an error with the key for signing data to be sent to Absio Broker™ application
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the padding is not supported to decrypt the key file
        BadPaddingException - thrown if the cipher padding is not supported to decrypt the key file
        IllegalBlockSizeException - thrown if the cipher block size is wrong to decrypt the key file
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • register

        public byte[] register(String password,
                       String passphrase,
                       String reminder)
                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                       InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                       NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                       IllegalAccessException,
                       IOException,
                       BrokerException,
                       SignatureException,
                       InvalidKeyException,
                       NoSuchPaddingException,
                       BadPaddingException,
                       IllegalBlockSizeException,
                       InterruptedException
        This will register the new user, authenticate with Absio Broker™ application and push the new key file to Absio Broker™ application.

        NOTE: this requires an initialized session.

        Parameters:
        password - the new user's password (required)
        passphrase - the new user's passphrase (required)
        reminder - the new user's reminder (optional - will be blank if not provided)
        Returns:
        the encrypted key file content
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the password or passphrase are empty or null
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - thrown if the cipher algorithm is not supported to decrypt the key file
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if the algorithm is not known to decrypt the key file
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not initialized
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        SignatureException - thrown when there was an error signing data to be sent to Absio Broker™ application
        InvalidKeyException - thrown when there was an error with the key for signing data to be sent to Absio Broker™ application
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the padding is not supported to decrypt the key file
        BadPaddingException - thrown if the cipher padding is not supported to decrypt the key file
        IllegalBlockSizeException - thrown if the cipher block size is wrong to decrypt the key file
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • update

        public SecuredContainer update(UUID containerId,
                               byte[] content,
                               String headerString,
                               List<Access> accesses,
                               String type)
                        throws Exception
        Update the content, header, access and type of the secured container with the given ID.

        Calling this method requires an authenticated session. See logIn(UUID, String, String) for authenticating.

        Specified by:
        update in interface IContainerProvider
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the secured container to update
        content - the new content
        headerString - the new header
        accesses - This is the defined access for all users. If null, the user updating the container will get full access (Access.DefaultOwnerPermissions). If any access is defined then the user creating the updating will get the defined access or no access if none is defined.
        type - the new type
        Returns:
        the SecuredContainer with the new metadata from the Absio Broker™ application
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there any issues encrypting and updating the data on the Absio Broker™ application

      • updateAccess

        public void updateAccess(UUID containerId,
                         List<Access> accessLevels)
                  throws IOException,
                         InterruptedException,
                         BrokerException,
                         IllegalAccessException
        Updates the access for a SecuredContainer on the Absio Broker™ application.
        Specified by:
        updateAccess in interface IContainerProvider
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the SecuredContainer to update access for
        accessLevels - the new access list for the SecuredContainer
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not authenticated

      • updateHeader

        public SecuredContainer updateHeader(UUID containerId,
                                     String headerString)
                              throws Exception
        Update the header of the secured container with the given ID.

        Calling this method requires an authenticated session. See logIn(UUID, String, String) for authenticating.

        Specified by:
        updateHeader in interface IContainerProvider
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the secured container
        headerString - the new header
        Returns:
        the secured container with the new header encrypted and new metadata
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there are any issues encrypting and updating the header in the file system

      • updateType

                       String type)
                throws IOException,
                       InterruptedException,
                       BrokerException,
                       IllegalAccessException
        Update the type of a SecuredContainer on the Absio Broker™ application.

        Calling this method requires an authenticated session. See logIn(UUID, String, String) for authenticating.

        Specified by:
        updateType in interface IContainerProvider
        Parameters:

        type - the new type value for the SecuredContainer
        Throws:

        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if the session is not authenticated
